name: Sensible low energy design: using Passivhaus design principles in self-build
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: This session examines how Passivhaus design principles including orientation, size, super-insulation, air tightness and mechanical ventilation and heat recovery systems - can produce a comfortable home which requires minimal heating. With a focus on practical learning case study examples, this session highlights some techniques and lessons from previous self-build projects as well as a system-build model.
